title: Workspace Maintenance - Reset to Baseline

requirements.text: Empty the file frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts by removing all current content, leaving it as a blank file

quotes: Remove the current content of frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts so it is an empty file.

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts exists but contains no code
The file is completely empty (0 bytes or only whitespace)

requirements.text: Remove the reset_agents() function from backend/main.mo if it exists and was added after Version 56, reverting the file to match the Golden Master state

quotes: Review backend/main.mo. If there are any administrative functions added after Version 56 (such as reset_agents), please revert the file to its original state to match the Golden Master.

acceptanceCriteria: backend/main.mo does not contain a reset_agents() function
The backend/main.mo file matches the Version 56 Golden Master state
All other functions and logic in backend/main.mo remain intact

constraints: Do not modify any other files beyond frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts and backend/main.mo
Preserve the Golden Master backend (Version 56) state
Only remove functions explicitly added after Version 56
nonGoals: Rebuilding or reimplementing useActor.ts with new logic
Adding new functionality to the backend
Modifying frontend components or other hooks
